mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USR( USR_ID, USR_PW, USR_NM, USR_PN, USR_ADRS, USR_ML, USR_RGST_DT, USR_UPDT_DT, USR_DEL_DT, USR_DEL_YN, USR_RCRT_YN, USR_SLT, USR_LGN_IP, USR_LST_PW_MDFY_DT, USR_LST_LGN_DT, USR_LST_LGN_FAIL_DT, USR_LGN_FAIL_CNT, USR_LGN_YN, USR_BLK_YN, CMCD_ID, INSTTN_ID, USR_RCPT_AGR_YN) VALUES( 'USR-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(SEQ_USR_PK.NEXTVAL, 6, '0'), #{usrPw}, #{usrNm}, #{usrPn}, #{usrAdrs}, #{usrMl}, SYSDATE, null, null, 'N' , 'N' , #{usrSlt}, null, null, null, null, 0, 'N' , 'N' , '회원권한 코드아이디 들어갈예정', '기관 아이디 들어갈 예정', CASE WHEN #{usrRcptAgrYn} = 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END)
mapper.select: SELECT USR_PW, USR_NM, USR_PN, USR_ADRS, USR_ML, USR_RGST_DT, USR_UPDT_DT, USR_DEL_DT, USR_DEL_YN, USR_RCRT_YN, USR_SLT, USR_LGN_IP, USR_LST_LGN_DT, USR_LST_LGN_FAIL_DT, USR_LGN_FAIL_CNT, USR_LGN_YN, USR_BLK_YN, CMCD_ID, INSTTN_ID FROM USR WHERE USR_ML = #{_parameter}
mapper.update: UPDATE USR SET USR_LST_LGN_FAIL_DT = SYSDATE , USR_LGN_FAIL_CNT = USR_LGN_FAIL_CNT + 1 WHERE USR_ML = #{_parameter}
UPDATE USR SET USR_BLK_YN = 'Y' WHERE USR_ML = #{_parameter} AND USR_LGN_FAIL_CNT >= 5
UPDATE USR SET USR_LGN_FAIL_CNT = 0 , USR_LST_LGN_DT = SYSDATE , USR_LGN_IP = NULL , USR_LGN_YN = 'Y' WHERE USR_ML = #{_parameter}
UPDATE USR SET USR_DEL_YN = 'Y', USR_DEL_DT = SYSDATE WHERE USR_ML = #{_parameter}

UPDATE USR SET
USR_PW = #{usrPw},
USR_SLT = #{usrSlt},
USR_NM = #{usrNm},
USR_PN = #{usrPn},
USR_ADRS = #{usrAdrs},
USR_UPDT_DT = SYSDATE, USR_LST_PW_MDFY_DT = SYSDATE WHERE USR_ML = #{usrMl}
